one.text_one: Hi! I am a fullstack developer with 3 years of commercial experience. Recently, I have been working intensively on a SaaS product in the advertising industry (distribution and display). You could say I have a solid understanding of how to build scalable and truly efficient web applications. I am now looking for a place where I can dive into deep waters and fully spread my wings in MERN technologies (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js).
one.text_two: Goal? To work on innovative projects that truly make sense and where I can contribute to creating something cool and effective. I am ready for new challenges! I would be happy to join a team that values quality work and provides space for growth.

text.header_one_text: In chess, I love strategic thinking and predicting several moves ahead. My favorite opening is the King's Indian Defense.
text.header_two_text: My favorite place on Earth is the Tatra Mountains. Every summer and winter break, I try to go there even for a single day to reset in the mountains. I have already climbed 80% of the highest Tatra peaks and plan to conquer them all soon (Gotta catch 'em all :D).
text.header_three_text: I am also interested in cinematography â€” both from the artistic and narrative perspectives. I am inspired by how creators build emotions, rhythm, and atmosphere. My favorite director is Christopher Nolan.

description.0: Development and maintenance of web applications used within the company
description.1: Integration of applications with external APIs
description.2: Creating and optimizing MySQL database queries
description.3: Collaboration with the project team using Agile methodology
description.4: Participation in task planning and estimation
